FuncDef: The display vxlan vni command displays VXLAN configurations. The display vxlan vni command displays VXLAN configurations. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a VNI ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16777215.

Displays detailed configurations of the VXLAN with a specified VNI ID.
-

ExtraInfo: After a VXLAN is configured, to check the VNI status and BD to which the VNI is mapped, run the display vxlan vni command. The command output helps you determine whether the VXLAN is correctly configured.
